otherNames: Mysterious Magic Fun Fun Pharmacy, ふしぎ魔法 ファンファン・ファーマシィー
synopsis: In a small town, there is a small pharmacy called Fun Fun Parmacy. Popuri, a girl who recently moved in downtown, discovers this pharmacy and meets Miss Fukiko, who is actually a witch. Miss Fukiko gives Popuri a mysterious bottle that can create magic spirits.
